issue.title: Compilation problems for arm32 and armhf

content.raw:
This is impacting the generation of arm docker images. When fixed we should remember to enable back the support in [https://github.com/osrf/docker\_images](https://github.com/osrf/docker_images/pull/374#issuecomment-582705561) .

Motivated by the comment: [https://github.com/osrf/docker\_images/pull/374#issuecomment-582705561](https://github.com/osrf/docker_images/pull/374#issuecomment-582705561)
content.html:
This is impacting the generation of arm docker images. When fixed we should remember to enable back the support in https://github.com/osrf/docker_images .
